source.0839a800:
df['52w L'] = df['52w L'].str.replace(',','')
df['52w L'] = df['52w L'].astype(float)
source.880b7261:
df['Open'] = df['Open'].astype(int)
df['High'] = df['High'].astype(int)
df['Low'] = df['Low'].astype(int)
df['LTP'] = df['LTP'].astype(int)
df['Chng'] = df['Chng'].astype(int)
df['% Chng'] = df['% Chng'].astype(int)
df['Volume (lacs)'] = df['Volume (lacs)'].astype(int)
df['Turnover (crs.)'] = df['Turnover (crs.)'].astype(int)
df['52w H'] = df['52w H'].astype(int)
df['365 d % chng'] = df['365 d % chng'].astype(int)
df['30 d % chng	'] = df['30 d % chng'].astype(int)

source.f9d2d8cb:
bank_df = df['Symbol'].isin(['AXISBANK','HDFCBANK','ICICIBANK','INDUSINDBK','KOTAKBANK','SBIN','HDFC','BAJAJFINSV','BAJFINANCE','HDFCLIFE'])
bank_table = df[bank_df].pivot_table(values =['Open','High','Low','LTP','Chng','Volume (lacs)','52w H','52w L','Turnover (crs.)','365 d % chng','30 d % chng'], index= ['Symbol'])
bank_table.reset_index(level=0, inplace=True)
bank_table
source.aaa2d596:
plt.figure(figsize=(15,7))
plt.xticks(rotation=45)


sns.barplot(data = bank_table, x = 'Symbol', y = '365 d % chng', palette='flare')


plt.xlabel("Symbol")  # add X-axis label
plt.ylabel('% Change in a Year')  # add Y-axis label
plt.title("Yearly Growth")  # add title


plt.show

source.c76a9e14: ### TECHM and WIPRO are generated higher returns in comparison to peers however almost all the companies have added the value of ~30% in investor's porfolio for a year's holding period
source.ce8bdd93: ### None of the stock has shown upward trend in 30 days. Should stay invested for higher time frame
source.54020d1f: ### Creating a group of IT sector
source.cc3c8ce3: ### Investors should avoid investing in DRREDDY. 0% wealth creation for investors in a year. Fixed Deposit returns are comparatively better investment choice if investing in DRREDDY.
source.151535c2: ### Year has been most value-adding for TATA MOTORS are its has outperformed its peers with extermely high returns
source.2cf8f39e: ### None of the stocks have any correlation with one another.Turnover is different for all while even 30 day change and 365 days change has not correlation within the category to be considered as any investing sector.
source.9627f020: ### Except Maruti, rest of the stocks have same range volume, turnover.
source.eeca0a46: ### Plotting Boxplot as well the below histogram, we can find that majority of the companies have shown atleast  10% returns if stayed invested for a year in it
source.1ac717e7: ### Reliance is the alone leader in this category. Rest of the stocks are following a range bound pattern
source.56bbcf8f: ### Creating a group of Automotors sector
source.77e9bc7a: ### TATASTEEL and GRASIM has been worst hit in the month of September. While the same including JSWSTEEL, HINDALCO has highest returns in a years timeframe

### Without doubt investor should be aggressive in ONGC as it has outperformed its peers by approx 50% more returns with investment period of atleast a month.

source.2501df7b: ### When we plot 30d %chg, hardly any stock has given positive returns. In such instances, it seems 30days is not enough holding period for Nifty50 stocks. Investors should hold it for relatively higher time frame.
source.ac4779c6: ### As the above data, BajajFinserv and SBIN have shown extremely positive growth in comparison to its peers. HDFC LIFE has shown no growth against its peers. Same applies for majority of banks.
source.cd79ae4b: ### TCS and INFY has least change in 30days and least increment in a years time span. While rest of the stocks have highest decline in 30 days but highest returns in 365 days.INFY and TCS are safe bets in IT sector.
